%% Set up the Title Page - DO NOT EDIT THIS, (if you don't want to ;)  )
%% instead specify your name, title and more in "/Settings/Administrative.tex"
%\title   {\myTitle}
%\authors {\texorpdfstring
%            {\href{\myAuthorEmail}{\myAuthorName}}
%            {\myAuthorName}
%         }
%\addresses  {\groupname\\\deptname\\\univname}  
%\date       {\myDate}
%\subject    {\mySubject}
%\keywords   {\myKeywords}
%
%\maketitle
%%% ----------------------------------------------------------------
%
%\setstretch{1.3}  % It is better to have smaller font and larger line spacing than the other way round
%
%% Define the page headers using the FancyHdr package and set up for one-sided printing
%\fancyhead{}  % Clears all page headers and footers
%\rhead{\thepage}  % Sets the right side header to show the page number
%\lhead{}  % Clears the left side page header

\title   {\myTitle}
\authors {
            {\myAuthorName}
         }
\addresses  {\groupname\\\deptname\\\univname}  
\date       {\myDate}
\subject    {\mySubject}
\keywords   {\myKeywords}

\begin{titlepage}
	\pagestyle{empty}
	\begin{center}
		{\Large {\bfseries \MakeUppercase{\univname} \\}}
		{\Large {\bfseries \deptname \\}}
		\vspace{1cm}
		\includegraphics[width=6cm,height=6cm]{units_logo.jpg}\\
		\vspace{1.5cm}
		{\Large \mySubject \space \myDegree \\}
		\vspace{1cm}
		{\Large {\bfseries \myTitle \\}}
		\vfill
		{Ottobre 2018 \\}
		\vfill
		%\begin{table}[h]
		%	\centering
		%	{\large
		%		\begin{tabular}{c c c c c c r c c | c c l}
		%			& & & & & & Laureando & & & & & Relatore \\
		%			& & & & & & \bfseries Sebastiano Genna & & & & & \bfseries Prof. Egidio Barbi \\
		%		\end{tabular}
		%	}
		% \end{table}
		\begin{table}[h]
			\centering
			{\large
				\begin{tabular}{ r c c | c c l}
					Laureando & & & & & Relatore \\
					\bfseries Sebastiano Genna & & & & & \bfseries Prof. Egidio Barbi \\
				\end{tabular}
			}
		\end{table}
		
		\vspace{1cm}
		{\large Anno Accademico 2017/2018 \\}
	\end{center}
\end{titlepage}
